title: Pulse: Deception
description: Danger. Romance. Death.Bryn Everly is inching closer to the answers she's been seeking.Who is the Cold Creek Killer? Was her father's death really an accident or was it murder? Who is killing off her friends? Bryn dives headfirst into trying to solve the murders, forcing her to face a question she’d rather not ask herself: Is she the next target?Murder isn’t the only thing on Bryn’s mind. She’s still captivated by sexy, boy-next-door Julian. But if she's so enraptured with him, why does she find her mind sauntering back over to resident bad boy, Hudson? Shrouded in secrets, no one really knows what he’s up to.Danger, romance, and emotions collide in this fast-paced and sexy installment #2 in the Pulse series.PULSE is a new adult novella series from Arie James and Bette Colton, told in sexy and dangerous installments.
author: Arie James
